H0.text: Which musician and composer said 'Wagner has wonderful moments, and dreadful quarters of an hour'. Mozart

H1.text: Which musician and composer said 'Wagner has wonderful moments, and dreadful quarters of an hour'. Verdi

H2.text: Which musician and composer said 'Wagner has wonderful moments, and dreadful quarters of an hour'. Brahms

H3.text: Which musician and composer said 'Wagner has wonderful moments, and dreadful quarters of an hour'. Rossini

A4.text: Gioachino Rossini, who said 'Wagner has wonderful moments, and dreadful quarters of an hour.'
